description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Mango & Lime Dipping Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Dipping sauce,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Mango,Low fat
name: Creamy Mango & Lime Dipping Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the mango, pull the flesh off the seed and discard the seed.
Using a food processer blend the mango flesh with the light sour cream adding the lime juice and the mango chutney. Continue blending until the mixture is smooth and consistent.
Now season with salt and pepper. Pour it into a bowl with a lid and pop it in the fridge so itâ€™s nice and cool when you are ready to serve.
